attributes.action: Give The British Transport Police Juristiction on London Buses
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As you may agree that currently there is no police force working on londons over crowded buses, with pick pockets and loud mouthed violent yob's who put their feet on the seat and cause dristress for other passengers. Not to mention vulnerable people like the elderly and disabled who need to feel safe, especially in loud busy london with drunks and yob's loitering the streets at night. So I'am asking you to please consider giving The British Transport Police juristiction on London's Bus network.
